monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 1.Seven Against Thebes

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
Fixed card breaks at 149, 158 and added line numbers 158b, 832b, 833b.

$Log: aesch.seven_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-10-09 19:49:18  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:26  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.9  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.8  2003/07/01 22:14:26  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.7  2000/03/06 20:05:31  amahoney
fix headers for TOC

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.4  1999/12/23 18:19:40  amahoney
convert to P3

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: o(/stis fula/ssei pra=gos e)n pru/mnh| po/lews
oi)/aka nwmw=n, ble/fara mh\ koimw=n u(/pnw|.
ei) me\n ga\r eu)= pra/caimen, ai)ti/a qeou=:

l.#text: ei) d' au)=q', o(\ mh\ ge/noito, sumfora\ tu/xoi,
u(ma=s  de\ xrh\ nu=n, kai\ to\n e)llei/pont' e)/ti

l: h(/bhs a)kmai/as kai\ to\n e)/chbon xro/nw|,
w(/ran t'  e)/xonq'  e(/kaston  w(/ste  sumprepe/s,
po/lei t' a)rh/gein kai\ qew=n e)gxwri/wn
te/knois te, *gh=| te mhtri/, filta/th| trofw=|:
h( ga\r ne/ous e(/rpontas eu)menei= pe/dw|,

l.#text: pistou\s o(/pws ge/noisqe pro\s xre/os to/de.

l: kai\ nu=n me\n e)s to/d' h)=mar eu)= r(e/pei qeo/s:
kalw=s ta\ plei/w po/lemos e)k qew=n kurei=.
nu=n d' w(s o( ma/ntis fhsi/n, oi)wnw=n both/r,

l.#text: e)n w)si\ nwmw=n kai\ fresi/n,  puro\s di/xa,
a)ll' e)/s t' e)pa/lceis kai\ pu/las purgwma/twn

l: pu/rgwn sta/qhte, kai\ pulw=n e)p' e)co/dois

l.#text: tarbei=t' a)/gan o(/milon: eu)= telei= qeo/s.
skopou\s de\ ka)gw\ kai\ katopth=ras  stratou=

l: e)/pemya, tou\s pe/poiqa mh\ mata=n o(dw=|:
kai\ tw=nd' a)kou/sas ou)/ ti mh\ lhfqw= do/lw|.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: h(/kw safh= ta)kei=qen e)k stratou= fe/rwn,

l: au)to\s kato/pths d' ei)/m' e)gw\ tw=n pragma/twn:
h)\ gh=n qano/ntes th/nde fura/sein fo/nw|:
mnhmei=a/ q' au(tw=n  toi=s tekou=sin e)s do/mous
lei/bontes: oi)=ktos d' ou)/tis h)=n dia\ sto/ma.
kai\ tw=nde pu/stis  ou)k o)/knw| xroni/zetai:

l.#text: klhroume/nous d' e)/leipon, w(s pa/lw| laxw\n

l: e(/kastos au)tw=n pro\s pu/las a)/goi lo/xon.
pro\s tau=t' a)ri/stous a)/ndras e)kkri/tous po/lews

l.#text: xwrei=, koni/ei, pedi/a d' a)rghsth\s a)fro\s

l: su\ d' w(/ste nao\s kedno\s oi)akostro/fos

l.#text: kai\ tw=nde kairo\n o(/stis w)/kistos labe/:

l: ei)dw\s ta\ tw=n qu/raqen a)blabh\s e)/sh|.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: w)= *zeu= te kai\ *gh= kai\ polissou=xoi qeoi/,
mh/ moi po/lin ge prumno/qen panw/leqron
e)leuqe/ran de\ gh=n te kai\ *ka/dmou po/lin
ge/nesqe d' a)lkh/: cuna\ d' e)lpi/zw le/gein:
po/lis ga\r eu)= pra/ssousa dai/monas ti/ei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: r(ei= polu\s o(/de lew\s pro/dromos i(ppo/tas:

l: e)/ti de\ <ga=s> e)ma=s  pedi/' o(plo/ktup'  w)-
ti\ xri/mptei boa/n:  pota=tai, bre/mei d'
i)w\ qeoi\ qeai/ t' o)ro/menon kako\n
ti/s a)/ra r(u/setai, ti/s a)/r' e)parke/sei

l.#text: a)kou/et' h)\ ou)k a)kou/et' a)spi/dwn ktu/pon;

l: pe/plwn kai\ stefe/wn  po/t' ei) mh\ nu=n a)m-
ktu/pon de/dorka: pa/tagos ou)x e(no\s doro/s.
de po/lin a(/n pot' eu)filh/tan e)/qou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ku=ma ga\r  peri\ pto/lin doxmolo/fwn a)ndrw=n
donei=,  dia\ de/ toi genu/wn i(ppi/wn

l.#text: su/ t', *)/arhs, feu=, feu=, po/lin e)pw/numon

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/ po/lis a)/mmi pa/sxei, ti/ genh/setai;
poi= d' e)/ti te/los e)pa/gei qeo/s;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: su/ te, ma/kair'  a)/nass' *)/ogka, pro\ po/lews

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: h)= tau=t' a)/rista kai\ po/lei swth/ria,
mh/t' e)n kakoi=si mh/t' e)n eu)estoi= fi/lh|
kratou=sa me\n ga\r ou)x o(milhto\n qra/sos,

l.#text: dei/sasa d' oi)/kw| kai\ po/lei ple/on kako/n.

l: kai\ nu=n poli/tais ta/sde diadro/mous fuga\s
ta\ tw=n qu/raqen d' w(s a)/rist' o)fe/lletai,
au)toi\ d' u(p' au)tw=n  e)/ndoqen porqou/meqa.
kei) mh/ tis a)rxh=s th=s e)mh=s a)kou/setai,
a)nh\r gunh/ te xw)/ ti tw=n metai/xmion,
leusth=ra dh/mou d' ou)/ ti mh\ fu/gh| mo/ron.

l.#text: me/lei ga\r a)ndri/, mh\ gunh\ bouleue/tw,

l: ta)/cwqen: e)/ndon d' ou)=sa mh\ bla/bhn ti/qei.
h)/kousas h)\ ou)k h)/kousas, h)\ kwfh=| le/gw;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: i(ppikw=n t' a)pu/an  phdali/wn dia\ sto/ma

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: ti/ ou)=n; o( nau/ths a)=ra mh\ 's prw=|ran fugw\n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)ll' e)pi\ daimo/nwn pro/dromos h)=lqon a)r-
o(/t' o)loa=s neifome/nas  bro/mos e)n pu/lais:
dh\ to/t' h)/rqhn fo/bw| pro\s maka/rwn lita/s, po/lews

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: ou)kou=n  ta/d' e)/stai pro\s qew=n: a)ll' ou)=n qeou\s
tou\s th=s a(lou/shs po/leos  e)klei/pein lo/gos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: mh/pot' e)mo\n kat' ai)w=na li/poi  qew=n

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: mh/ moi qeou\s kalou=sa bouleu/ou kakw=s:

l.#text: mh/thr, gunh\ swth=ros: w(=d' e)/xei lo/gos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)/sti: qeou=  d' e)/t' i)sxu\s kaquperte/ra:
polla/ki d' e)n kakoi=si to\n  a)ma/xanon

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s

l.#text: a)ndrw=n ta/d' e)sti/, sfa/gia kai\ xrhsth/ria

l: so\n d' au)= to\ siga=n kai\ me/nein ei)/sw do/mwn.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: ou)/toi fqonw= soi daimo/nwn tima=n ge/nos:
a)ll' w(s poli/tas mh\ kakospla/gxnous tiqh=|s,

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: mh/ nun, e)a\n qnh/|skontas h)\ tetrwme/nous

l.#text: kai\ mh\n a)kou/w g' i(ppikw=n fruagma/twn.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: mh/ nun  a)kou/ous' e)mfanw=s a)/kou' a)/gan.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: ou)kou=n e)/m' a)rkei= tw=nde bouleu/ein pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: de/doik', a)ragmo\s d' e)n pu/lais o)fe/lletai.

l.#text: ou) si=ga mhde\n tw=nd' e)rei=s kata\ pto/lin;

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: ou)k e)s fqo/ron  sigw=s' a)nasxh/sh| ta/de;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qeoi\ poli=tai, mh/ me doulei/as tuxei=n.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: au)th\ su\ douloi=s ka)me\ kai\ pa=san po/lin.

l.#text: w)= pagkrate\s *zeu=, tre/yon ei)s e)xqrou\s be/los.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: moxqhro/n, w(/sper a)/ndras w(=n a(lw=| po/lis.

l.#text: ai)toume/nw| moi kou=fon ei) doi/hs te/los.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: le/gois a)\n w(s ta/xista, kai\ ta/x' ei)/somai.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: si/ghson, w)= ta/laina, mh\ fi/lous fo/bei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: sigw=: su\n a)/llois pei/somai to\ mo/rsimon.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: tou=t' a)nt' e)kei/nwn tou)/pos ai(rou=mai se/qen.

l.#text: kai\ pro/s ge tou/tois, e)kto\s ou)=s' a)galma/twn,

l: eu)/xou ta\ krei/ssw, cumma/xous ei)=nai qeou/s:

l.#text: e)gw\ de\ xw/ras toi=s polissou/xois qeoi=s,

l: ste/yw pro\ naw=n, polemi/wn d' e)sqh/mata.
ou) ga/r ti ma=llon mh\ fu/gh|s to\ mo/rsimon.
e)gw\ de/ g'  a)/ndras e(\c e)moi\ su\n e(bdo/mw|
pri\n a)gge/lous sperxnou/s te kai\ taxurro/qous
lo/gous i(ke/sqai kai\ fle/gein xrei/as u(/po.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: me/lei, fo/bw| d' ou)x u(pnw/ssei ke/ar:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)\ e)/, ne/as te kai\ palaia\s

l.#text: korkorugai\  d' a)n' a)/stu, proti\ pto/lin

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion *a
l: o(/ toi kato/pths, w(s e)moi\ dokei=, stratou=

l.#text: peuqw/ tin' h(mi=n, w)= fi/lai, ne/an fe/rei,

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion *b
l: kai\ mh\n a)/nac o(/d' au)to\s *oi)di/pou to/kos
spoudh\ de\ kai\ tou=d' ou)k a)parti/zei po/da.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: le/goim' a)\n ei)dw\s eu)= ta\ tw=n e)nanti/wn,

l: w(/s t'  e)n pu/lais e(/kastos ei)/lhxen pa/lon.
bre/mei, po/ron d' *)ismhno\n ou)k e)a=| pera=n
o( ma/ntis: ou) ga\r sfa/gia gi/gnetai  kala/.
sai/nein mo/ron te kai\ ma/xhn a)yuxi/a|.

l.#text: sei/ei, kra/nous xai/twm', u(p' a)spi/dos d' e)/sw

l: e)/xei d' u(pe/rfron sh=m' e)p' a)spi/dos to/de,
lampra\ de\ panse/lhnos e)n me/sw| sa/kei,
boa=| par' o)/xqais potami/ais, ma/xhs e)rw=n,

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: ko/smon me\n a)ndro\s ou)/tin' a)\n tre/saim' e)gw/,
lo/foi de\ kw/dwn t' ou) da/knous' a)/neu doro/s.

l.#text: kai\ nu/kta tau/thn h(\n le/geis e)p' a)spi/dos

l: ta/x' a)\n ge/noito ma/ntis h( a)noi/a tini/.
ei) ga\r qano/nti nu\c e)p' o)fqalmoi=s pe/soi,
tw=| toi fe/ronti sh=m' u(pe/rkompon to/de

l.#text: ge/noit' a)\n o)rqw=s e)ndi/kws t' e)pw/numon,

l: kau)to\s kaq' au(tou= th/nd' u(/brin manteu/setai.
ma/l' eu)genh= te kai\ to\n *ai)sxu/nhs qro/non
ai)sxrw=n ga\r a)rgo/s, mh\ kako\s d' ei)=nai filei=.
spartw=n d' a)p' a)ndrw=n, w(=n *)/arhs e)fei/sato,
r(i/zwm' a)nei=tai, ka/rta d' e)/st' e)gxw/rios,

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: tou/tw| me\n ou(/tws eu)tuxei=n doi=en qeoi/:
gi/gas o(/d' a)/llos tou= pa/ros lelegme/nou

l.#text: mei/zwn, o( ko/mpos d' ou) kat' a)/nqrwpon fronei=,

l: pu/rgois d' a)peilei= dei/n', a(\ mh\ krai/noi tu/xh:
qeou= te ga\r qe/lontos e)kpe/rsein po/lin
kai\ mh\ qe/lonto/s fhsin, ou)de\ th\n *dio\s

l.#text: ta\s d' a)strapa/s te kai\ kerauni/ous bola\s

l: e)/xei de\ sh=ma gumno\n a)/ndra purfo/ron,
fle/gei de\ lampa\s dia\ xerw=n w(plisme/nh:
xrusoi=s de\ fwnei= gra/mmasin prh/sw po/lin.
ti/s a)/ndra kompa/zonta  mh\ tre/sas menei=;

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: kai\ tw=|de ke/rdei ke/rdos a)/llo ti/ktetai.
xara=| matai/a| qnhto\s w)\n ei)s ou)rano\n
pe/poiqa d' au)tw=| cu\n di/kh| to\n purfo/ron
a)nh\r d' e)p' au)tw=|, kei) sto/margo/s e)st' a)/gan,
le/g' a)/llon a)/llais e)n pu/lais ei)lhxo/ta.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: kai\ mh\n to\n e)nteu=qen laxo/nta pro\s pu/lais

l.#text: e)sxhma/tistai  d' a)spi\s ou) smikro\n  tro/pon:

l: stei/xei pro\s e)xqrw=n pu/rgon, e)kpe/rsai qe/lwn.
boa=| de\ xou)=tos gramma/twn e)n cullabai=s,
w(s ou)d' a)\n *)/arhs sf' e)kba/loi purgwma/twn.

l.#text: kai\ tw=|de fwti\ pe/mpe to\n fere/gguon

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: pe/mpoim' a)\n h)/dh to/nde, su\n tu/xh| de/ tw|:
kai\ dh\ pe/pemptai  ko/mpon e)n xeroi=n e)/xwn,
a)ll' h)\ qanw\n trofei=a plhrw/sei xqoni/,
h)\ kai\ du/'  a)/ndre kai\ po/lism' e)p' a)spi/dos

l.#text: ko/mpaz' e)p' a)/llw|, mhde/ moi fqo/nei le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pro/max' e)mw=n do/mwn, toi=si de\ dustuxei=n.
w(s d' u(pe/rauxa ba/zousin  e)pi\ pto/lei

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: a(/lw de\ pollh/n, a)spi/dos ku/klon le/gw,
o( shmatourgo\s d' ou)/ tis eu)telh\s a)/r' h)=n
o(/stis to/d' e)/rgon w)/pasen pro\s a)spi/di,
bakxa=| pro\s a)lkh\n *quia\s  w(\s fo/bon ble/pwn.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s

l.#text: a)nh\r kat' a)/ndra tou=ton h(|re/qh, qe/lwn

l: ou)/t' ei)=dos ou)/te qumo\n ou)d' o(/plwn sxe/sin
e)xqro\s ga\r a(nh\r  a)ndri\ tw=| custh/setai,
qeou/s: o( me\n ga\r pu/rpnoon *tufw=n' e)/xei,
stadai=os h(=stai, dia\ xero\s be/los fle/gwn:
pro\s tw=n kratou/ntwn d' e)sme/n, oi( d' h(sswme/nwn,

l.#text: ei)ko\s de\  pra/cein  a)/ndras w(=d' a)ntista/tas,
swth\r ge/noit' a)\n *zeu\s e)p' a)spi/dos tuxw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)/filon e)n sa/kei tou= xqoni/ou de/mas
dai/monos,  e)xqro\n ei)/kasma brotoi=s  te kai\

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: ou(/tws ge/noito.  to\n de\ pe/mpton au)= le/gw,
o)/mnusi d' ai)xmh\n h(\n e)/xei ma=llon qeou=
stei/xei d' i)/oulos a)/rti dia\ parhi/dwn,
o( d' w)mo/n, ou)/ti parqe/nwn e)pw/numon,
fro/nhma, gorgo\n d' o)/mm' e)/xwn, prosi/statai.
ou) mh\n a)ko/mpasto/s g' e)fi/statai pu/lais:
to\ ga\r po/lews o)/neidos e)n xalkhla/tw|
fe/rei d' u(f' au(th=| fw=ta *kadmei/wn e(/na,
w(s plei=st' e)p' a)ndri\ tw=|d' i)a/ptesqai be/lh.

l.#text: e)lqw\n d' e)/oiken ou) kaphleu/sein ma/xhn,

l: makra=s keleu/qou d' ou) kataisxunei=n  po/ron,
pu/rgois a)peilei= toi=sd' a(\ mh\ krai/noi qeo/s.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s

l.#text: ei) ga\r tu/xoien w(=n fronou=si pro\s qew=n,

l: h)= ta)\n panw/leis pagka/kws t' o)loi/ato.
e)/stin de\ kai\ tw=|d', o(\n le/geis to\n *)arka/da,
a)nh\r a)/kompos, xei\r d' o(ra=|  to\ dra/simon,
o(\s ou)k e)a/sei glw=ssan e)rgma/twn a)/ter

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: kai\ to\n so\n au)=qis prosqrow=n  o(mo/sporon,
di/s t' e)n teleuth=| tou)/nom' e)ndatou/menos,
kalei=.  le/gei de\ tou=t' e)/pos dia\ sto/ma:

l.#text: h)= toi=on e)/rgon kai\ qeoi=si prosfile/s,

l: kalo/n t' a)kou=sai kai\ le/gein mequste/rois,
po/lin patrw/|an kai\ qeou\s tou\s e)ggenei=s
mhtro/s te phgh\n ti/s katasbe/sei di/kh;

l.#text: patri/s te  gai=a sh=s u(po\ spoudh=s dori\

l: e)/gwge me\n dh\ th/nde pianw= xqo/na,

l.#text: toiau=q' o( ma/ntis a)spi/d' eu)kh/lws e)/xwn

l: pa/gxalkon hu)/da: sh=ma d' ou)k e)ph=n ku/klw|.
ou) ga\r dokei=n a)/ristos, a)ll' ei)=nai qe/lei,
e)c h(=s ta\ kedna\ blasta/nei bouleu/mata.
pe/mpein e)painw=.  deino\s o(\s qeou\s se/bei.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: e)n panti\ pra/gei d' e)/sq' o(mili/as kakh=s
h)\ ga\r cuneisba\s ploi=on eu)sebh\s a)nh\r

l.#text: h)\ cu\n poli/tais a)ndra/sin di/kaios w)\n
ou(/tws d' o( ma/ntis, ui(o\n *oi)kle/ous  le/gw,

l:
tei/nousi pomph
 th
 makra
 pa/lin molei=n,

l.#text: dokw= me\n ou)=n sfe mhde\ prosbalei=n pu/lais

l: ou)x w(s a)/qumos ou)de\ lh/matos ka/kh=|,
a)ll' oi)=den w(/s sfe xrh\ teleuth=sai ma/xh|,
filei= de\ siga=n h)\ le/gein ta\ kai/ria.

l.#text: o(/mws d' e)p' au)tw=| fw=ta, *lasqe/nous bi/an,

l: ge/ronta to\n nou=n, sa/rka d' h(bw=san fu/ei,
podw=kes o)/mma, xei=ra d' ou) bradu/netai

l.#text: qeou= de\ dw=ro/n e)stin eu)tuxei=n brotou/s.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
l: to\n e(/bdomon dh\ to/nd' e)f' e(bdo/mais pu/lais
le/cw, to\n au)tou= sou= kasi/gnhton, po/lei
soi\ cumfe/resqai kai\ ktanw\n qanei=n pe/las,
fugh=| to\n au)to\n to/nde tei/sasqai  tro/pon.
*di/kh d' a)/r' ei)=nai/ fhsin, w(s ta\ gra/mmata
le/gei  kata/cw d' a)/ndra to/nde kai\ po/lin

l.#text: su\ d' au)to\s h)/dh gnw=qi ti/na pe/mpein dokei=:

l: me/myh|, su\ d' au)to\s gnw=qi nauklhrei=n po/lin.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: w)= qeomane/s te kai\ qew=n me/ga stu/gos,
w)/moi, patro\s dh\ nu=n a)rai\ telesfo/roi.
a)ll' ou)/te klai/ein ou)/t' o)du/resqai pre/pei,
e)p' a)spi/dos flu/onta su\n  foi/tw| frenw=n.
ei) d' h( *dio\s pai=s parqe/nos *di/kh parh=n
e)/rgois e)kei/nou kai\ fresi/n, ta/x' a)\n to/d' h)=n:
a)ll' ou)/te nin fugo/nta mhtro/qen sko/ton,

l.#text: ou)/t' e)n trofai=sin, ou)/t' e)fhbh/santa/ pw,

l: ou)d'  e)n patrw/|as mh\n xqono\s kakouxi/a|
oi)=mai/ nin au)tw=| nu=n parastatei=n pe/las.

l.#text: h)= dh=t'  a)\n ei)/h pandi/kws yeudw/numos

l: a)/rxonti/ t' a)/rxwn kai\ kasignh/tw| ka/sis,

l.#text: e)xqro\s su\n e)xqrw=| sth/somai. fe/r' w(s ta/xos

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: e)s xei=ras  e)lqei=n: ai(=ma ga\r kaqa/rsion.

l: a)ndroi=n d' o(mai/moin qa/natos w(=d' au)tokto/nos,
ou)k e)/sti gh=ras tou=de tou= mia/smatos.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: ei)/per kako\n fe/roi tis, ai)sxu/nhs a)/ter
e)/stw: mo/non ga\r ke/rdos e)n teqnhko/si:

l.#text: kakw=n de\ ka)|sxrw=n ou)/tin' eu)klei/an e)rei=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/ me/monas,  te/knon; mh/ ti/ se  qumoplh-
qh\s dori/margos  a)/ta fere/tw: kakou= d'

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: e)pei\ to\ pra=gma ka/rt' e)pispe/rxei qeo/s,

l.#text: fi/lou ga\r e)xqra/  moi patro\s ta/lain'  a)ra\

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)lla\ su\ mh\ 'potru/nou: kako\s ou) keklh/-
sh| bi/on eu)= kurh/sas: mela/naigis d': ou)k

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
l: xa/ris d' a)f' h(mw=n o)lome/nwn qauma/zetai:
ti/ ou)=n e)/t' a)\n sai/noimen o)le/qrion mo/ron;

l.#text: nu=n o(/te soi pare/staken: e)pei\ dai/mwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: piqou=  gunaici/, kai/per ou) ste/rgwn o(/mws.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: le/goit' a)\n w(=n a)/nh tis:  ou)de\ xrh\ makra/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh\ 'lqh|s o(dou\s su\ ta/sd' e)f' e(bdo/mais pu/lais.

l.#text: teqhgme/non toi/ m' ou)k a)pamblunei=s lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ni/khn ge me/ntoi kai\ kakh\n tima=| qeo/s.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: ou)k a)/ndr' o(pli/thn tou=to xrh\ ste/rgein e)/pos.

sp.speaker: *)eteoklh/s
sp.l: qew=n dido/ntwn ou)k a)\n e)kfu/gois kaka/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: kakw=n d' w(/sper qa/lassa ku=m' a)/gei:
to\ me\n pi/tnon, a)/llo d' a)ei/rei

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos

l.#text: po/lis d' e)n eu)di/a| te kai\ kludwni/ou

l: ste/gei de\ pu/rgos, kai\ pu/las fereggu/ois
kalw=s  e)/xei ta\ plei=st', e)n e(\c pulw/masi:

l.#text: ta\s d' e(bdo/mas o( semno\s e(bdomage/ths

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/sti pra=gma neo/koton po/lei ple/on;

l.#text: ti/nes;  ti/ d' ei)=pas;  parafronw= fo/bw| lo/gou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)\ 'gw\  ta/laina, ma/ntis ei)mi\ tw=n kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)kei=qi kei=sqon ; bare/a d' ou)=n o(/mws fra/son.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ou(/tws o( dai/mwn koino\s h)=n a)mfoi=n a)/gan.
au)to\s d' a)naloi= dh=ta du/spotmon ge/nos.

l.#text: po/lin me\n eu)= pra/ssousan, oi( d' e)pista/tai,

l: e(/cousi d' h(\n la/bwsin e)n tafh=| xqono/s,
pe/pwken ai(=ma/  gai='  u(p' a)llh/lwn fo/nw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: kako/n me kardi/an  ti peripi/tnei kru/os.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/ d' a)/llo g' h)\ po/noi po/nwn
a)lla\ go/wn,  w)= fi/lai, kat' ou)=ron
a)lla\ ga\r h(/kous' ai(/d' e)pi\ pra=gos

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pai=da to\n au(ta=s  po/sin au(ta=| qeme/na

l.#text: tou/sd' e)/tex', oi( d' w(=d' e)teleu/-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pe/pautai d' e)/xqos, e)n de\ gai/a|

l.#text: e)n ai(=s e)qei/nonto, kai\ duoi=n krath/-

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: i)w\ i)w/,  pou= sfe qh/somen xqono/s;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
l: dokou=nta kai\ do/cant' a)pagge/llein me xrh\

l.#text: stugw=n ga\r e)xqrou\s qa/naton ei(/let' e)n po/lei

l: i(erw=n patrw/|wn d'  o(/sios w)\n momfh=s a)/ter
te/qnhken ou(=per toi=s ne/ois qnh/|skein  kalo/n.
ou(/tw me\n a)mfi\ tou=d' e)pe/staltai le/gein:
ei) mh\ qew=n tis e)mpodw\n e)/sth dori\
tw=| tou=d':.  a)/gos de\ kai\ qanw\n kekth/setai
ou(/tw pethnw=n to/nd' u(p' oi)wnw=n dokei=

l.#text: a)/timon ei)=nai  d' e)kfora=s fi/lwn u(/po.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
l: h)\n mh/ tis a)/llos to/nde sunqa/ptein qe/lh|,
e)gw/ sfe qa/yw ka)na\ ki/ndunon balw=

l.#text: qa/yas' a)delfo\n to\n e)mo/n, ou)d' ai)sxu/nomai

l: deino\n to\ koino\n spla/gxnon, ou(= pefu/kamen,
ta/fon ga\r au)tw=| kai\ kataskafa\s e)gw/,
kau)th\ kalu/yw, mhde/ tw| do/ch| pa/lin:

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: au)dw= po/lin se mh\ bia/zesqai ta/de.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: au)dw= se\  mh\ perissa\ khru/ssein e)moi/.

l.#text: traxu/s ge me/ntoi  dh=mos e)kfugw\n kaka/.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: tra/xun': a)/qaptos d' ou(=tos ou) genh/setai.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)ll' o(\n po/lis stugei=, su\ timh/seis ta/fw|,;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: ou)/, pri/n ge xw/ran th/nde kindu/nw| balei=n.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)ll' ei)s a(/pantas a)nq' e(no\s to/d' e)/rgon h)=n.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
l: e)gw\ de\ qa/yw to/nde: mh\ makrhgo/rei.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.l: a)ll' au)to/boulos i)/sq', a)penne/pw d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/ pa/qw; ti/ de\ drw= ; ti/ de\ mh/swmai;
teu/cei: kei=nos d' o( ta/las a)/goos
ei)=sin: ti/s a)\n ou)=n ta\ pi/qoito ;

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion *a
l: koino\n to/d' a)/xos, kai\ po/lis a)/llws

sp.speaker: *(hmixo/rion *b
